bill.title: An Act To Make Voluntary Membership in a Public Employee Labor Organization in the State

history.action: (H) Committee on Labor, Commerce, Research and Economic Development suggested and ordered printed.

(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
